card_text: Pay 2000 LP and declare 1 Monster Card name; your opponent looks at their Deck, reveals 1 of the declared monsters if there is any, and chooses 1 of these effects to be applied.$N●The declared monster is added to the hand of the player who activated this card.$N●The player who activated this card Special Summons the declared monster to their field in Attack Position, ignoring its Summoning conditions.
